Appetizers.Name: House Salad
Appetizers.Ingredients: Lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, blue cheese, house  dressing
Appetizers.Description: Our house blend of crisp, juicy, and fresh vegetables and mixed with our famous dressing.

Appetizers.Name: Mozarella Sticks
Appetizers.Description: Locally produced cheese deep fried in our homemade bread crumbs.

Cold Sandwhiches.Name: BLT
Cold Sandwhiches.Description: Locally farmed bacon, fresh crisp lettuce and tomatoes on our homemade artisan bread.

Cold Sandwhiches.Name: Italian Cut
Cold Sandwhiches.Indgredients: Salami, prosciuto, pepperoni, provolone cheese, olive oil
Cold Sandwhiches.Description: Our italian cuts mix served with locally produced provolone and drizzled with house pressed olive oil on rye.

Hot Sandwhiches.Name: Hey Panini!
Hot Sandwhiches.Indgredients: Mozarella, provolone, american white cheese, tri tip steak, green peppers, artisan bread
Hot Sandwhiches.Description: What we're famous for. A 3 cheese blend toasted in our artisan bread with juicy tri tip steak and roasted green peppers.

Hot Sandwhiches.Name: Grilled Cheese
Hot Sandwhiches.Indgredients: Mozarella, provolone, american white cheese, artisan bread
Hot Sandwhiches.Description: Our 3 cheese blend on homemade artisan bread grilled to golden perfection.

Desserts.Name: Lava Cake
Desserts.Description: Hot to order chocolate cake filled with decadent chocolate sauce and sprinkled with powdered sugar.

Desserts.Name: Reese Shake
Desserts.Indgredients: Milk, ice cream, Reeses Peanut Butter Cups, chocolate, vanilla
Desserts.Description: A chocolate vanilla shake blended with Reese's Cups.

Drinks.Name: Yerba Mate
Drinks.Description: Hot yerba mate imported from Paraguay served to you in the traditional gourde with bombilla.

Drinks.Name: Herbal Tea
Drinks.Description: Hot tea steeped for a minimum of 15 minutes.
